text: I like this explanation <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/losses-for-parameter-estimation-of-neural-sde/50771/13?u=mschauer> for  <https://github.com/mschauer/MitosisStochasticDiffEq.jl> which implements the same protocol (and can be used interchangeably  with Mitosis, so you can for example mix  a continuous time latent SDE model with Gaussian errors on the discrete time observations
